Stereotype.name: Splitter
Stereotype.notes: Inherits BaseObject with a couple of abstract methods needed for components that have an user interface.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: direction
Tag.description: How should it split the available space (horizontal/vertical)

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the component will not be made visible during the initializeObject call trough the viewObject method

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: mainContainerIdx
Tag.description: The index of the main container.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: Maximum height of the window

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: Maximum width of the window

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: Minimum height of the window

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the container.

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: resizable
Tag.description: Can the user resize the split

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: ToolGroup
Stereotype.notes: A simple container for grouping multiple related tool buttons together.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: firstEntryField
Tag.description: The first object name that will get applyEntry when this container gets focus, defaults to the first field in the container in the order of the create event

Tag.name: handleConfirms
Tag.description: If true, the container binds Enter to call it's ConfirmOk event and Esc to its ConfirmCancel event. (Usually overriden in child classes, not from server properties)

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnDestroy
Tag.description: Allows the container to be persisted event after a successful existObject or destroy call. The container will be simply hidden in the case of this events and not destroyed;

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the component will not be made visible during the initializeObject call trough the viewObject method

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: initPage
Tag.description: The page this container will be initially displaying

Tag.name: layout
Tag.description: The name of the layout manager prototype to be used as the general layout manager of the container. Valid values are: (LineLayout, TableLayout, StackLayout). If the value of this property is passed in as string (‘quoted’ value in properties) then the name of the layout manager will be looked up in the Quarix.Layout namespace, otherwise if it is used as an Java Script reference then it will be instantiated with the following parameters (container, pageName).

Tag.name: layoutCellSpacing
Tag.description: The number of pixels between the layout cells.

Tag.name: layoutSingleLine
Tag.description: If this is false/missing, IE will make the *group* multi-line instead of the containing toolbar

Tag.name: layoutTableCols
Tag.description: the number of columns the table layout will have

Tag.name: layoutTableRows
Tag.description: the number of rows the table layout will have

Tag.name: letBrowserAdjustLayout
Tag.description: Let the browser to automatically adjust the layout.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: Maximum height of the window

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: Maximum width of the window

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: Minimum height of the window

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the container.

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: showAllLabels
Tag.description: Displays the text labels of each tool button from it's composition.

Tag.name: showSomeLabels
Tag.description: Displays the text labels of each tool button from it's composition that has preferLabel option set to true.

Tag.name: singlePage
Tag.description: When true, a single DOM node is created for the container which serves as both the DOMNode and the ContentDOMNode. Also, all objects are assumed to be in page 0.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: ToolBar
Stereotype.notes: Being a proper container there is no restriction related to where you can put a Toolbar respectively to it's parent, but linking with a Container.CreateObjects link to SmartWindow it becomes the window's tool bar and to a SmartBrowse and becomes the browsers tool bar.

Stereotype.name: StatusPanel
Stereotype.notes: The StatusPanel is a conventional container implementation that allows diverse components to be placed in the windows status panel.

Stereotype.name: BaseWindow
Stereotype.notes: The default implementation of a window, able to work either as a in line window (browser window/tab), as an virtual internal document window (inline) or an lighter internal window (overlay).

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Tag.name: bottom
Tag.description: Bottom position of the window in pixels

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: closable
Tag.description: Specifies if the window should be close able

Tag.name: closeOnCancel
Tag.description: If there is an ESC key pressed event then if this parameters value is true, the window will initiate a confirmCancel event and if that is true then an exitObject.

Tag.name: closeOnOk
Tag.description: On RETURN key press on the window there will be an confirmOk event fired, if that is true and the closeOnOK parameter is also true then the window will also execute an exitObject on itself;

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: draggable
Tag.description: Specify if the window can be moved

Tag.name: FireValueChangedOnExit
Tag.description: If set to true, the window will fire an valueChanged(windowInstance, window.objectValue) event before all destroy but only after all the window children’s returned false to confirmExit;

Tag.name: firstEntryField
Tag.description: The first object name that will get applyEntry when this container gets focus, defaults to the first field in the container in the order of the create event

Tag.name: gridX
Tag.description: Move and resize will snap on a grid

Tag.name: gridY
Tag.description: Move and resize will snap on a grid

Tag.name: handleConfirms
Tag.description: If true, the container binds Enter to call it's ConfirmOk event and Esc to its ConfirmCancel event. (Usually overriden in child classes, not from server properties)

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnClose
Tag.description: Allows the window to be persisted event after a successful existObject or destroy call. The window will be simply hidden in the case of this events and not destroyed;

Tag.name: hideOnDestroy
Tag.description: Allows the container to be persisted event after a successful existObject or destroy call. The container will be simply hidden in the case of this events and not destroyed;

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the component will not be made visible during the initializeObject call trough the viewObject method

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: initPage
Tag.description: The page this container will be initially displaying

Tag.name: layout
Tag.description: The name of the layout manager prototype to be used as the general layout manager of the container. Valid values are: (LineLayout, TableLayout, StackLayout). If the value of this property is passed in as string (‘quoted’ value in properties) then the name of the layout manager will be looked up in the Quarix.Layout namespace, otherwise if it is used as an Java Script reference then it will be instantiated with the following parameters (container, pageName).

Tag.name: layoutCellSpacing
Tag.description: The number of pixels between the layout cells.

Tag.name: layoutTableCols
Tag.description: the number of columns the table layout will have

Tag.name: layoutTableRows
Tag.description: the number of rows the table layout will have

Tag.name: left
Tag.description: Left position of the window in pixels

Tag.name: letBrowserAdjustLayout
Tag.description: Let the browser to automatically adjust the layout.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: Maximum height of the window

Tag.name: maximizable
Tag.description: Specifies if the window should be maximizable

Tag.name: maximizeOnInit
Tag.description: Maximizes the window, the window will fit the viewable area of the page at initialization or at viewObject if the window is set on hideOnInit

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: Maximum width of the window

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: Minimum height of the window

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the container.

Tag.name: modal
Tag.description: Specifies if the window should display modal (prohibit the user from interacting with other windows in the background or not)

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: recenterAuto
Tag.description: Recenter modal window when browser size has changed

Tag.name: resizable
Tag.description: Specifies if the window should be user re sizable

Tag.name: right
Tag.description: Right position of the window in pixels

Tag.name: showShadow
Tag.description: Applies only to the overlay type of window, specifies if a shadow should be created around the window.

Tag.name: singlePage
Tag.description: When true, a single DOM node is created for the container which serves as both the DOMNode and the ContentDOMNode. Also, all objects are assumed to be in page 0.

Tag.name: title
Tag.description: The title to be displayed on the window

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: top
Tag.description: Top position of the window in pixels

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: windowType
Tag.description: Specifies the type of UI this window will display. Possible values are: 'inline', 'internal' and 'overlay'. The in line window will be represented as a normal browser tab window while the internal window will be a virtual window that potentially can be maximized, minized, resized. There are massive differences in terms of life cycle of a window between the window types

Tag.name: wiredDrag
Tag.description: Move/Resize will be done with a wired frame (customizable in CSS, class <className>_wired_frame. Look in alphacube.css for an example)

Tag.name: afterSubmitEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated after the submit occurs.

Tag.name: afterSubmitExecute
Tag.description: Java script code to be executed after the submit occurs.

Tag.name: afterSubmitPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published after the submit occurs.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: asynchronous
Tag.description: Specifies whether the form will be submitted asynchronously or not.

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: beforeSubmitEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated before the submit occurs.

Tag.name: beforeSubmitExecute
Tag.description: Java script code to be executed before the submit occurs.

Tag.name: beforeSubmitPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published before the submit occurs.

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: exitOnSuccess
Tag.description: If the form submit is successful the form view will ask for confirmExit in case exitOnSuccess is set to true.

Tag.name: firstEntryField
Tag.description: The first object name that will get applyEntry when this container gets focus, defaults to the first field in the container in the order of the create event

Tag.name: handleConfirms
Tag.description: If true, the container binds Enter to call it's ConfirmOk event and Esc to its ConfirmCancel event. (Usually overriden in child classes, not from server properties)

Tag.name: height
Tag.description: The desired height of the window (pixels)

Tag.name: hide
Tag.description: If set to true will prevent the object from making its gui visible

Tag.name: hideOnDestroy
Tag.description: Allows the container to be persisted event after a successful existObject or destroy call. The container will be simply hidden in the case of this events and not destroyed;

Tag.name: hideOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true, the component will not be made visible during the initializeObject call trough the viewObject method

Tag.name: hotkey
Tag.description: If set, a hotkey is automatically assigned to the object at initialization

Tag.name: id
Tag.description: Object name/identifier (must be unique in DOM)

Tag.name: initPage
Tag.description: The page this container will be initially displaying

Tag.name: layout
Tag.description: The name of the layout manager prototype to be used as the general layout manager of the container. Valid values are: (LineLayout, TableLayout, StackLayout). If the value of this property is passed in as string (‘quoted’ value in properties) then the name of the layout manager will be looked up in the Quarix.Layout namespace, otherwise if it is used as an Java Script reference then it will be instantiated with the following parameters (container, pageName).

Tag.name: layoutCellSpacing
Tag.description: The number of pixels between the layout cells.

Tag.name: layoutTableCols
Tag.description: the number of columns the table layout will have

Tag.name: layoutTableRows
Tag.description: the number of rows the table layout will have

Tag.name: letBrowserAdjustLayout
Tag.description: Let the browser to automatically adjust the layout.

Tag.name: maxHeight
Tag.description: Maximum height of the window

Tag.name: maxWidth
Tag.description: Maximum width of the window

Tag.name: method
Tag.description: The HTTP method through which the parameters will be sent (possible values are : 'post', 'get')

Tag.name: minHeight
Tag.description: Minimum height of the window

Tag.name: minWidth
Tag.description: The minimum width of the container.

Tag.name: objectPage
Tag.description: The page where the object is placed inside parent container

Tag.name: onDestroyEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDestroyPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDestroy' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onDisableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onDisable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code for 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onEnableObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'onEnable' event.

Tag.name: onHideObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be executed at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onHideObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event be published at 'hideObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectEval
Tag.description: URL to be evaluated at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectExecute
Tag.description: Javascript code to handle the 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: onViewObjectPublish
Tag.description: Event to be published at 'viewObject' event

Tag.name: singlePage
Tag.description: When true, a single DOM node is created for the container which serves as both the DOMNode and the ContentDOMNode. Also, all objects are assumed to be in page 0.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: url
Tag.description: The URL of the form to which the form parameters will be sent.

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)

Stereotype.name: BaseContainer
Stereotype.notes: The Container family of components is designed to enable developers to create different kinds of content-containing modules on the web.

Stereotype.name: Accordion
Stereotype.notes: The Accordion is an interface element similar to a vertical set of tabs - when you click on the header of an accordion panel, the header animates either up or down to reveal its associated container. Being rendered vertically there is space to accommodate more markup than simply the name of the tab. Thus an accordion tab can have a lot more information than a normal tab usually does.

Tag.name: align
Tag.description: The horizontal alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'left', 'right', 'middle'

Tag.name: backgroundColor
Tag.description: Specifies the color of the containers background. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.PanelBackground in which case it does not need to be quoted;

Tag.name: border
Tag.description: The name of the border this container will display.

Tag.name: borderColor
Tag.description: In case there is a SOLID border requested the color of the solid border will be specified with this property, otherwise it will not be used by other border types. Its value can be a string containing the hex code of the color ('#FFFFFF') or the name of the color ('red') or a Java Script expression that evaluates to a color, like: Quarix.Theme.BorderColor in which case it does not need to be quoted

Tag.name: borderWidth
Tag.description: Only applies to SOLID border and specifies the widthof the border line.

Tag.name: class
Tag.description: An additional CSS class name to be appended to the DOM object class name in order to customize its appearance.

Tag.name: direction
Tag.description: The direction of the split. "v" (vertical) means the headers and page displayed are horizontal blocks (one on top of each other, each 100% width), as opposed to "h" (horizontal) which makes them vertical blocks (each 100% height), which places them side-by-side.

Tag.name: disable
Tag.description: Flag set to true if the object is disabled

Tag.name: disableOnInit
Tag.description: If set to true the object will be disabled during the processing of visual object properties, processing which happens in the private method _processVisualObjectProperties usually after the DOM Nodes of the component have been created

Tag.name: placeHeaderAfter
Tag.description: By default the page headers are above/before the pages themselves. If this is set to true, they are displayed after the blocks

Tag.name: showAll
Tag.description: If the value is true then all the pages of the container will be displayed, otherwise similar to the rest of the containers only the current page will be displayed.

Tag.name: toggleMode
Tag.description: If true, pages can be closed\shown individually as opposed to the default mode where there is one and only one page visible at a time.

Tag.name: tooltip
Tag.description: The tooltip message the component will display on mouse over

Tag.name: valign
Tag.description: The vertical alignment of the component in the layout cell. Possible values are: 'top', 'bottom', 'middle', 'baseline'

Tag.name: width
Tag.description: The desired width of the window (pixels)
